plot: Portrait of 18 year-old Michael who's been homeless since the age of 13. He lives on the streets of Copenhagen, sleps in hallways and in trains, steals from stores, and is into drugs.
title: Gadebarn tur/retur
plot_es: Portrait of 18 year-old Michael who's been homeless since the age of 13. He lives on the streets of Copenhagen, sleps in hallways and in trains, steals from stores, and is into drugs.
